QuestData.Title: The Treasure of the Shen'dralar
QuestData.Description: In the library, Athenaeum, you will find an ancient chest hidden beneath the stairway. Take from it that which you desire.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to the Athenaeum and find the Treasure of the Shen'dralar. Claim your reward!
QuestData.RewardText: You open the chest to find...
